name: Car Game Build 11
description:
Controls:

WASD/Arrows: Drive

Left/Right Ctrl: Burnout

Space: Handbrake

R: Reset

P: Change Skybox

Changelog:

- More physics changes.

- Moved speedometer.

- Fixed collision on hills.

- Added the burnout key.

- Added input display.

- Added teapots and tire objects.

- Added some weird ramps.

Dev notes:

Really happy with this version :)
